topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5533348563687218fad40d00#post_5533348563687218fad40d00
^looks fine to me^

I mean I really like the idea of the divisiveness that comes from something like superman existing. ESPECIALLY after the fight from the man of steel. Also I like that we finally have a live action batman that's very clearly visually inspired by one from the comics instead of an original design (frank miller's dark knight returns version from what I can tell) 

I think as long as they don't do anything stupid and manage in aquaman and wonder woman decently, it'll at least be better than man of steel.

I looooove the thing of batman fighting superman. 
Many versions of batman are so demented that it's not hard to imagine one that thinks the idea of someone being more powerful than him instantly makes them a threat that needs to be eliminated, no matter their intention.

plus, again, after the fight from man of steel, batman's probably going to have a bone to pick with him at very least. 

-^also I'm not gonna even go into how batman could totally beat super man because that could go on for hours^-
